alert.note: Alert for Atchison; Doniphan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 31 at 2:29PM CST until January 02 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM SATURDAY TO MIDNIGHT CST SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Kansas and north central, northeast and northwest Missouri. * WHEN...From 3 AM Saturday to midnight CST Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
